titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the provision of additional assistance to the Nicaraguan democratic resistance pursuant to title II of the Military Construction Appropriations Act of 1987.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Committee on Appropriations discharged. Pursuant to the provisions of P. L. 99-500.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 33.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48-52. Record Vote No: 31.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Congress disapproves the provision of additional assistance under the Military Construction Appropriations Act, 1987 to the Nicaraguan democratic resistance.
